documentation.author: Chirayu Patel
documentation.purpose:
The purpose of this rule is to alert (Send "Discharge Notification") to below nursing staff (Positions) who have established relationship (Active relationship) either as "Charge Nurse" or "Staff Nurse" with a patient, when "Discharge Patient" order is placed.
-- Positions -- Float LPN Float RN Float RN Ped LPN LPN Behavioral Health LPN OB RN RN Behavioral Health RN Critical Care RN Critical Care Neonate RN Critical Care Ped RN OB RN OB Team Lead RN Pediatric Acute Nurse Director/Manager

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_LIST_E
templateDefinitions.definition: an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS and an optional order detail of OPT_ORDER_DETAIL that OPT_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_APPLICATION_E
templateDefinitions.definition: The application being used QUALIFIER APPLICATION
templateDefinitions.description: Application that generated the evoking event

statements.statement: select Application_Name = ap.description, _hidden = ap.application_number from application ap where ap.active_ind = 1 /*and (ap.direct_access_ind = 1 or ap.application_number in (961000,600005,380000)) */ and ap.application_number > 0 and ap.description > " " order application_name

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_LOC_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL that QUAL in DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_LIST_INCOMING_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS and an optional order detail of OPT_ORDER_DETAIL that OPT_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALC_SAVE_L
templateDefinitions.description: Create a value to be used by subsequent templates

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_BUILD_PARAM_L
templateDefinitions.definition: ACTION a dynamic parameter named PARAMNAME with a value of PARAMVALUE. And OPT_SUBSTITUTION resolve substitution value.
templateDefinitions.description: Create or add to a dynamic parameter to be used by subsequent templates.

statements.statement:
select action = if (d.seq = 1) "Create" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Append To" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) "1" elseif (d.seq = 2) "2" ENDIF
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(2))
select param_value ="Double click in lower box to enter a freetext value, or right click and paste values that have been copied", _hidden = " " from (dummyt d with seq = 1)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_MESSENGER_ESC_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Send message to OPT_RECIPIENT and/or OPT_FT_RECIPIENT with subject OPT_SUBJECT, text OPT_MSG and a OPT_PRIORITY priority related to ESC_LINK. Delay escalation of the message for TIME_INTERVAL TIME_UNIT and STOP_FLAG escalation.
templateDefinitions.description: Send escalation message to printer, email, alphapager

value.value: SELECT into "nl:" FROM ENCNTR_PRSNL_RELTN E, PRSNL P@NEWLINEplan e where e.encntr_id = trigger_encntrid@NEWLINEand e.encntr_prsnl_r_cd in (value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",333,"CHARGENURSE")),@NEWLINEvalue(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",333,"STAFFNURSE")))@NEWLINEand e.active_ind = 1 and e.expiration_ind = 0@NEWLINEjoin p where p.person_id = e.prsnl_person_id@NEWLINEand p.position_cd in (value(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",88,"FLOATLPN")),@NEWLINEvalue(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",88,"FLOATRN")),@NEWLINEvalue(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",88,"FLOATRNPED")),@NEWLINEvalue(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",88,"LPN")),@NEWLINEvalue(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",88,"LPNBEHAVIORALHEALTH")),@NEWLINEvalue(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",88,"LPNOB")),@NEWLINEvalue(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",88,"RN")),@NEWLINEvalue(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",88,"RNBEHAVIORIALHEALTH")),@NEWLINEvalue(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",88,"RNCRITICALCARE")),@NEWLINEvalue(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",88,"RNCRITICALCARENEONATE")),@NEWLINEvalue(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",88,"RNCRITICALCAREPED")),@NEWLINEvalue(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",88,"RNOB")),@NEWLINEvalue(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",88,"RNOBTEAMLEAD")),@NEWLINEvalue(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",88,"RNPEDIATRICACUTE")),@NEWLINEvalue(uar_get_code_by("DISPLAYKEY",88,"NURSEDIRECTORMANAGER")))@NEWLINEhead report@NEWLINElog_misc1 = ""@NEWLINEpcnt = 1@NEWLINEdetail@NEWLINEif(pcnt = 1)@NEWLINEretval = 100@NEWLINElog_misc1 = concat(trim(cnvtstring(cnvtint(e.prsnl_person_id))),".0|",@NEWLINEtrim(cnvtstring(cnvtint(e.prsnl_person_id))),".0|","PERSON|NOTIFY",@NEWLINEchar(6),trim(p.name_full_formatted,3),char(6),"NOTIFY")@NEWLINEelse@NEWLINEretval = 100@NEWLINElog_misc1 = concat(log_misc1,char(7),trim(cnvtstring(cnvtint(e.prsnl_person_id))),".0|",@NEWLINEtrim(cnvtstring(cnvtint(e.prsnl_person_id))),".0|","PERSON|NOTIFY",@NEWLINEchar(6),trim(p.name_full_formatted,3),char(6),"NOTIFY")@NEWLINEendif@NEWLINEpcnt += 1@NEWLINEwith nocounter go

@NEWLINE@NEWLINEPatient @patient:2 has discharge orders ready@NEWLINE

@NEWLINEPatient: @PATIENT:2
@NEWLINEFacility: @PTFACENC:2
@NEWLINENursing Unit: @PTNURSENC:2
@NEWLINERoom: @PTROOMENC:2
@NEWLINEBed: @PTLOCENC:2
@NEWLINE
@NEWLINEOrder: @CATALOGCDDISP:3
@NEWLINEOrder Date: @ORIGORDERDTTM:3
@NEWLINE

@NEWLINE@NEWLINE
